intro: Welcome to Speexify. By accessing or using our platform, you agree to be bound by these Terms & Conditions. If you do not agree, please do not use the platform. These Terms constitute a legally binding agreement between you and Speexify.

All services are delivered electronically through our website and platform, including live one-on-one tutoring sessions, group sessions, interactive virtual classrooms, and digital learning materials. Speexify acts as a platform connecting learners with qualified teachers and does not itself provide tutoring services directly.
